评论详情: If I could give this zero stars I would. First, it didn’t arrive as a dress. It was a corset only so the saying it is a dress is a falsehood.  Second, and even more importantly, it immediately broke when I tried to latch the first latch. This is absolute junk and you should stay far, far away from the product. Photos attached to show you exactly how poorly this product was made.

So the dresses quality sucked and it was for a Halloween costume. I’m a L/XL regular but I saw everyone saying size up so I did by a lot, but the dress still was tight? Ended up not being able to wear it. I also hated the look of it why were there 2 different fabrics? This dress is not worth the price honestly, If I could go back and save my 30+ dollars I would. Unfortunately I made the mistake of buying this. If I could give 0 stars I would
We only received the skirt, no corset. Returning for full outfit.
I thought this was a dress. I only received the corset.
Love this and it's so beautiful but the sheer was ripped when it arrived. I made do with it since I wore it for a vampire costume
The quality of this costume is amazing! It is very comfortable and looks great!

Got this costume for my daughter for her 17th birthday party! She was an October baby so we throw a Halloween themed party every year and the kids love dressing up. Each year we pick a theme and send out the invitation a few months advance so they can get their costumes. This one was a bittersweet year because we will only have one more year of planning her birthday party and then she’s off to college the next year. Back to the costume the size fit her perfectly, the color was as shown, the material wasn’t scratchy, or anything she never complained about it once. The top is a corset so she had to be tied into it and she said she felt like she was in the oh olden days but she loved it 😆 so we would definitely buy this again if we needed another one in the future! Great costume!!

The skirt was super puffy which isn't something I particularly liked. The corset was beautiful looking and it held me in all the right places. There are no zippers. The corset was the part I liked the most not the biggest fan of the puffy skirt!
I bought the size the chart said I should and it was still too small.
i love the corset, but didn’t like the skirt

The only 2 thing I can really say about this item that is positive is that the top was a great emerald color, and the skirt fit perfectly. The corset top, I get it, it's supposed to be tight and fitted. But if you want to breathe, sit down, go to the bathroom, or not flash everyone in the room, this item is not the greatest. I'm not a little gal, so I purchased a 7X based on the measurements, and it should have fit perfectly. Definitely not true to size for sure. Would recommend sizing up a few sizes for sure.
Zipper quality was horrible, cheaply made. Don’t waste your money.
Fits her like a glove. Very nice dress.
Lo pedí conforme a las instrucciones y aunque me quedó, una talla menos me hubiera quedado mejor, ya que el vestido es un poco más amplio

评论概述: Came late and Skirt messed up.
评论详情: Was so excited to wear this to a costume party. Unfortunately it was delayed and got delivered the day after I needed it. But also the skirt is missing the bottom layer so it is completely see through. Looks like it was cut out and returned previously or something. Very disappointed had purchased a different one last year and loved it.
The outfit was true to size and the corset overlapped the skirt well, no waist skin was showing. The corset still worked even with 34B size.
The material is really good and overall was amazing. The only cons I had was one of the little chains in front of the corset dropped off and idk how to put it back but everything else was pretty cool

I bought this for my Corpse Bride costume and honestly love the design, fabric, and corset style with the sleeves. It's not stretch at all, so it's important to get 2 sizes bigger than your actual size. I'm a size 6 sometimes, but mostly 8 (size M). I'm 5'5, 160 lbs and the corset barely fit. I got a size XL and had to undo the corset ties in the back to 90% capacity for it to fit. I'm a size 36 DD bra size, so if you want to remain modest, you will have to wear an undershirt as shown in the picture. Overall, I love it and can't wait to wear it!
Bought this for the renaissance fair next month, love it!! Fits perfect and looks great on
Too small Amazon recommended a 3x and I should of ordered a 4x I’m 5”7 250lbs.

Very disappointed.  I used the sizing chart they said to use, but still was too small  The shirt was also way too small.  I ordered an XL.  The shirt had to be a medium, it was so small.  Also there was no skirt.  Unless they consider the tails on each side to be a skirt.The shirt material very lightweight.  The corset also lightweight.  It probably would have been comfortable to wear.Returned item.

The product is great. It fits very snug and is adjustable on the bag and around the neck however needed with the material feeling very nice. And the skirt goes very well with the top and overall looks stunning.  A little sad over minor things upon arrival, such as a missing chain on the top and a clip being a little beat, feeling bumpy on one side and a little difficult to open and close.
I ordered this for a costume party and I was so sad to find that I only received the corset and NOT THE SKIRT!!!! Waste of money!
Fits great
The corset top chain was broken. The skirt ripped the next day.
Bought for a burlesque night. Loved the fit and quality. Definitely not a wear once a throw it out kind of outfit. It's very nice! True to size.

I got a 3x and I am 184 lbs 5ft 2in. Plenty of room to go bigger or smaller. Made well and very pretty. The skirt is a little shorter than I thought it would be but easily solved with a pair of black boy shorts. The skirt however does not have much give. I'm a size 12 and it just fit around my waist. I got a 3x because I am a 36 D up top and broad ribs. Overall it fit just right.

This review is for anyone not sure about sizing. I’m 5’4 128 lbs. Athletic build. 36D/27 inch waist/37 inch hips. The large size fit great. I did have to let the stings out in the back of the corset to get the corset zipped. But then I was able to tighten the strings to a better fit. The skirt is slightly loose in the waist but you cannot tell once the corset is on. I prefer the slightly loose fit as it’s much more comfortable to me this way. I normally wear a medium due to my chest size. If you are on the fence for sizing, follow the toe size charts to determine which way to go. I almost purchased the medium but I know it would have been too small now.
So pretty andfits nice! LONG delivery though. If u order now it’s too late for your event 😭

评论概述: Did not come with skirt, sizing chart wrong!
评论详情: I could not be more disappointed! First of all, it only came with the corset, no skirt! Secondly, I did my measurements accordingly to the chart and it is way too big on me! I’m completely disappointed and will be returning the item.

评论概述: Should have bought an size bigger.
评论详情: I should have read the comments before purchasing. Bought an large and should have purchased a size bigger. The skirt fits but I have to adjust the top piece to it.

It feels like it would be really good quality but it's so small. I typically wear large shirts. There's no way I should be ordering a 3x and it still be too small on me. Cool I could have probably played with it and got the laces to let me fit it but it's too small top to bottom. Like I get the choice to have my titties tucked or my stomach. Definitely not both. I wouldn't consider my torso to be long but this makes it seem that way.
The zipper broke before I could even wear it.
Cheap zipper but overall good costume.
I did not receive the top have of dress.... MOST IMPORTANT PART
I like the fabric

I typically wear a M-XL in tops, as I’m not very big or big chested. I’m about 5’3 and 215 pounds, with my weight mostly in my legs and read end. But I bought this in a XXL and it didn’t fit so I sent it back. Now, I bought a 4XL and it still doesn’t fit, and it doesn’t have the fabric flap to cover your skin when it’s laced. Had so much hope and did not meet expectations.

评论概述: Beautiful corset and skirt for a great price!
评论详情: I saw people saying it runs small so I ordered a XXL, it fits but I'm going to return it and get a XL. I want it a bit tighter but that's my preference.  It looks great and is great quality! I love this for my vampire outfit for the renaissance fair! 🧛‍♀️
The fit was perfect even tho I thought 4x would be to big. The skirt (not pictured here) fits a sm up to at least a 14/16

I am 5'8" about 200 lbs and I ordered the 4x based in reviews. I likely could have ordered a 3x but I'm fine with the 4. It looks exactly as it is pictured. It doesn't feel super cheap and I think I will get a lot of compliments.
Item not sized for Americans. 4x is like an 2x. Returned and reordered 2x.
Super cute, and true to size ! I ordered a small and am 5'1", 114 pounds.
Unfortunately it didn't fit properly. I liked it but disliked it wasn't true to size. I donated it to a Gothic clothing drive in NJ.

it’s really pretty and comfortable but the zipper broke. i fixed how it zipps up but other than that it’s really nice

Unless you are a child, or the size of a child with a small chest this won't work for you. Quality is so so. First it was missing the corset when it came so I reordered then it ended up being childsized. So definitely ended up sending it back
nice costume

I will post photos when I wear this outside. Nice fit.
When I bought this, it made it seem like it was a dress. It's separate and I didn't even receive the top part.

评论概述: Great look, arrived quickly, fun for dress up
评论详情: Haven't worn it yet, but loved the look, quality, and fast delivery. It looks just as pictured, and will be great for the event I am attending.

The dress was actually a better quality than I was expecting. The skirt is both a zip up and elastic waist. It was easy to take on and off. You do need to pull the strings out when you are first putting on the top but that is pretty standard for this type of top. I will be wearing this a few times.
Garment definitely runs small. I ordered one size larger but still needed a larger size. Thankful I ordered early enough to return and reorder!
I'm not pleased I payed for the corset and skirt and only got the corset the corset is nice but would like the rest of my order

I’m 5’2 and 220lbs so I have a bit of a tummy, as long as you measure accordingly (me personally my measurements were for the 4x) it should fit perfectly. I had no issues with this set at all, just be mindful if you’re short like me, the skirt is super long!! 😂

Bought this outfit for a renaissance festival, tried it on to make sure it fit and put it off to the side. I went to put it on the day of the event and the zipper broke. And because I was being proactive in getting my outfit a head of time, I am outside of the return window. Very disappointing
This was bought as a costume. On the second wear the zipper broke and was not repairable. Although the costume is beautiful, it was ruined when the zipper was unusable.

I felt part of the show at Chicago’s Teatro ZinZanni Love Chaos Dinner show. Nice material/quailty and nice fit with the adjustable back. You can pull it really snug for an “hourglass” fit or let loose and just enjoy the stunning look!
Wonderful dress.
I wore this for my birthday because I didn’t have any idea what to wear, but I saw this and it’s totally worth it.

The skirt is great in looks, touch, and fit, but the corset is missing and I'm very upset and disappointed about at.
